name: Romantra Perfume cologne Spray Amberly
description: The scent that will make you feel like a celebrity  in the spotlight. Unleash your mysterious inner  sensuality with whispers of feminine allure. The glow of amber flames, lingering Benzoin & Musk  infuses the long lasting fragrance with warmth to  wrap yourself in like a cozy blanket on your  special occasion. *Images for illustration purpose only, Product received may vary.
